hero.title: About Daoyou
hero.subtitle: Your journey to Dota2 mastery starts here

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe every Dota2 player deserves access to professional-level analysis and coaching. Daoyou was built to democratize gaming knowledge, helping players of all skill levels understand their gameplay and improve faster.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Born from a passion for Dota2 and AI technology, Daoyou started as a simple match analyzer and evolved into a comprehensive coaching platform. We combine cutting-edge AI with deep game understanding to deliver insights that were once only available to professional players.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: Pushing the boundaries of what AI can do for gaming analysis

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Built by players, for players. Your feedback shapes our development.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear pricing, honest communication, no hidden agendas

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: A passionate team of Dota2 players, AI engineers, and product designers

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
